content: **note ** the lower yardage amount is for only one of the dolls they each need the same amount now available at interweave 1 and as part of a new free e-book from crochet me 2 1 https //www interweave com/article/crochet/doug-and-gordo-amigurumi-dolls-as-seen-on-episode-312/ 2 http //www crochetme com/crochet-amigurumi-patterns/
